name: Flight Simulator X Games Explorer File
summary: An FSSAVE file is used to show a saved Microsoft Flight Simulator X game in Windows Games Explorer. It is linked to an associated .FLT file. When you click a saved game image that appears in Games Explorer, Games Explorer uses an FSSAVE file to open the associated FLT file in Flight Simulator X.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X Steam Edition
